changelog: Fix: 1-hour crash that killed HA Companion App. WakeLock now auto-renews every 30 min. Bluetooth scan jobs stop cleanly; GlobalScope coroutines replaced with structured concurrency; nested GATT launches removed. WebView gets 3-crash/1-min brake and 2-s rebuild delay; onDestroy wipes all dialogs to stop window leaks. UDP socket closed before job cancel, plus full exception logs. Runs overnight without a hiccup.
